Discover Your Perfect

foodWine.name: Med(eat)erranean
foodWine.subtitle: Culinary Journey
foodWine.desc: Sun-ripened tomatoes, hand-pulled mozzarella, ancient vineyards, and sunsets over the Mediterranean. An immersive culinary journey through the authentic flavors of Cilento.

cultural.name: Heritage Explorer
cultural.subtitle: Cultural Immersion
cultural.desc: Walk among ancient Greek temples at Paestum, explore medieval hilltop villages, and discover the rich tapestry of history that makes Cilento unique.
cultural.notes: Private guided tours of archaeological sites

roots.name: Roots Holiday
roots.subtitle: Heritage Journey
roots.desc: Reconnect with your Italian heritage. Walk the streets your ancestors walked, meet distant relatives, and discover the village that holds your family's story.

expertise.title: Local Expertise
expertise.desc: Over 20 years of intimate knowledge of Cilento's hidden gems and authentic experiences.

personal.title: Personal Touch
personal.desc: Every journey is personally curated by Teresa to match your interests and pace.

flexible.title: Flexible Pacing
flexible.desc: No rushed tours. Time to savor moments, connect with locals, and truly experience Cilento.

authentic.title: Authentic Access
authentic.desc: Exclusive access to family farms, private vineyards, and local homes off the tourist path.

experiences.quote: Teresa didn't just show us Campania — she made us feel like we belonged there.

castellabate.title: Castellabate
castellabate.subtitle: Medieval Hilltop Village
castellabate.desc: Wander through narrow cobblestone streets, admire panoramic Mediterranean views, and experience authentic village life in this perfectly preserved medieval gem.

marina.title: Marina di Camerota
marina.subtitle: Coastal Paradise
marina.desc: Crystal-clear turquoise waters, dramatic sea caves, and pristine beaches make this the crown jewel of the Cilento coastline.

paestum.title: Paestum Temples
paestum.subtitle: Ancient Greek Ruins
paestum.desc: Stand in awe before three of the world's best-preserved ancient Greek temples, surrounded by wildflowers and timeless beauty.

amalfi.title: Amalfi Coast
amalfi.subtitle: Coastal Beauty
amalfi.desc: Dramatic cliffs, colorful villages perched on hillsides, and the legendary beauty of Italy's most famous coastline.

dayTours.subtitle: SINGLE DAY ADVENTURES
dayTours.title:
Explore Cilento
in a Day
dayTours.intro: Perfect for those with limited time or as additions to your longer stay. Each tour is carefully crafted to maximize your experience.

paestum.name: Paestum Temples & Museum
paestum.desc: Walk among ancient Greek temples and explore the fascinating archaeological museum.

amalfi.name: Amalfi Coast Scenic Drive
amalfi.desc: Experience the dramatic beauty of the world's most famous coastline.

ebike.name: E-Bike Vineyard Tour
ebike.desc: Cycle through rolling hills to boutique vineyards for wine tasting and local lunch.

about.subtitle: YOUR CURATOR
about.title:
The Heart Behind
Your Journey
about.intro: For over 20 years, Teresa has been sharing her beloved Cilento with travelers from around the world. Her deep connections, local knowledge, and genuine passion create experiences that transform visitors into family.

story.name: Teresa's Story
story.title: Born and Raised in Cilento
story.desc: Teresa grew up among the olive groves and vineyards of Cilento. Her childhood was filled with the flavors of her grandmother's cooking, the stories of village elders, and the ancient rhythms of Mediterranean life.
story.highlight: Every journey I create is personal — because Cilento isn't just where I work, it's where my heart lives.

philosophy.name: Philosophy
philosophy.title: Travel That Transforms
philosophy.desc: Teresa believes that the best travel experiences come from genuine human connection. Her approach combines deep local knowledge with intuitive understanding of what each traveler seeks.
philosophy.highlight: I don't plan itineraries — I craft journeys that touch the soul.

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.title: 20+ Years of Local Knowledge
expertise.desc: Fluent in four languages, Teresa has built relationships with local farmers, artisans, chefs, and families across Campania. This network opens doors that remain closed to typical tourists.
expertise.highlight: My connections are your passport to authentic Italy.

about.quote: Teresa's knowledge of Cilento is encyclopedic, but it's her warmth and genuine care that made our trip unforgettable.

wine.title: The Art of Cilento Wine
wine.desc: Discover the ancient winemaking traditions that have shaped this region for millennia, from indigenous grape varieties to family cellars.

hiking.title: Hidden Trails of Cilento National Park
hiking.desc: Explore the secret paths that wind through Europe's largest national park, from coastal cliffs to mountain peaks.

roots.title: Finding Family: A Roots Holiday Story
roots.desc: Follow one family's emotional journey as they reconnect with their ancestral village and discover living relatives.

mozzarella.title: The Mozzarella Trail
mozzarella.desc: From buffalo farms to your table, experience the journey of Italy's most beloved cheese in its authentic home.

testimonials.subtitle: TRAVELER STORIES
testimonials.title:
Words from
Our Guests
testimonials.1: Teresa didn't just show us Campania — she made us feel like we belonged there. Every meal, every conversation, every view was carefully chosen.
testimonials.2: After 40 years of wondering about my grandfather's village, Teresa helped me walk those same streets and meet family I never knew I had.
testimonials.3: We've traveled extensively in Italy, but Cilento with Teresa showed us a side of the country we never knew existed. Authentic, warm, unforgettable.

story.subtitle: THE JOURNEY
story.title:
Two Decades
of Memories
story.p1: What began as sharing my beloved Cilento with curious friends has grown into a life's work of crafting transformative travel experiences. Every journey is infused with the same passion and personal touch that defined those early days.
story.p2: Over 20 years, I've had the privilege of introducing hundreds of travelers to the authentic soul of Southern Italy — not the tourist trails, but the hidden corners where traditions live and stories breathe.
story.quote: The best journeys don't just show you new places — they reveal new parts of yourself.
